Replying to @mrm 2019-07-01 17:04
@mrm @sarah_edo Interesting. I guess that's why so many other lazy loading approaches don't use a css blur effect. Since that detail is all CSS, it could live in a media query to only apply the blur on larger screens as an enhancement, and assume that a larger screen means not mobile Android.
